function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of resilience in critical infrastructure","Impact":"Disruption of essential services during crises","Mitigation":"Implementing alternative approaches to enhance resilience","Technologies":"Advanced monitoring and response systems","People":"Citizens relying on essential services","Owner":"Infrastructure owners and operators"},{"Description":"Ineffective cooperation among stakeholders","Impact":"Failure to address new and unpredictable threats effectively","Mitigation":"Establishing effective cooperation and partnerships among various stakeholders","Technologies":"Communication and collaboration platforms","People":"Stakeholders involved in critical infrastructure","Owner":"Government agencies and industry leaders"},{"Description":"Deficiencies in protection of critical infrastructure","Impact":"Exposure to major risks and vulnerabilities during crises","Mitigation":"Upgrading preparedness and capabilities to react to unexpected crises","Technologies":"Advanced security systems and risk assessment tools","People":"Citizens relying on critical infrastructure","Owner":"Infrastructure owners and operators"}]}
